ByID.ID: OML_O21:LOI_GU_C OML_O21:LOI_GU_PRN_C OML_O21:LOI_GU_PRU_C OML_O21:LOI_NG_C OML_O21:LOI_NG_PRU_C OML_O21:LOI_NG_PRN_C

Constraint.Description: EI_GU.3 (Universal ID) SHALL be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
EI_GU.4 (Universal ID Type) SHALL contain the value 'ISO' drawn from code system HL70301.
HD_GU.2 (Universal ID) SHALL be valued with an ISO-compliant OID.
HD_GU.3 (Universal ID Type) SHALL contain the value 'ISO' drawn from code system HL70301.
XPN_1-7 (Name Type Code) SHALL NOT be valued 'U'.
TS_0 SHALL be precise to the year.
TS_1 SHALL be precise to the second.
TS_2 SHALL be precise to the year.
TS_3 SHALL be precise to the year.
TS_4 SHALL be precise to the day OR be valued '0000'.
TS_5 SHALL be precise to the day.
TS_7 SHALL be precise to the day.

ByID.ID: XAD_LOI_PID XAD_LOI_NK1_4 XAD_LOI_NK1_32 XAD_LOI_IN1_5 XAD_LOI_IN1_19 XAD_LOI_GT1 XAD_LOI_ORC XAD_LOI_PRT XAD_LOI_OBX

Constraint.Description: If XAD-6 (Country Code) is valued 'USA' or not valued, then XAD-5 (Zip or Postal Code) SHALL be a valid USPS postal code.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID.Version Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.5.1' drawn from the code system HL70104.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Type.Message Code) SHALL contain the constant value 'OML' drawn from code system HL70076.
MSH-9.2 (Message Type.Trigger Event) SHALL contain the constant value 'O21' drawn from code system HL70003.
MSH-9.3 (Message Type.Message Structure) SHALL contain the constant value 'OML_O21' drawn from code system HL70354.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-9.1 (Message Code) SHALL contain the value 'ORL' drawn from code system HL70076.
MSH-9.2 (Trigger Event) SHALL contain the value 'O22' drawn from code system HL70003.
MSH-9.3 (Message Structure) SHALL contain the value 'ORL_O22' drawn from code system HL70354.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1' drawn from code system HL70104.
MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgement Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'NE' drawn from code system HL70155.
MSH-1 (Field Separator) SHALL contain the constant value '|'.
MSH-2 (Encoding Characters) SHALL contain the constant value '^~\&' or the constant value '^~\&#'.
MSH-9 (Message Type) SHALL contain the value 'ACK'ACK' drawn from the code system HL70076.
MSH-9.2 (Message Type.Trigger Event) SHALL contain the value 'O21' drawn from the code system HL70003.
MSH-9.3 (Message Type.Message Structure) SHALL contain the value 'ACK' drawn from the code system HL70354.
MSH-12.1 (Version ID) SHALL contain the constant value '2.5.1'.
MSH-15 (Accept Acknowledgement Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'NE' drawn from the code system HL70155.
MSH-16 (Application Acknowledgement Type) SHALL contain the constant value 'NE' drawn from the code system HL70155.
PID-1 (Set ID - PID) SHALL be valued with the constant value '1'.
NK1-1 (Set ID - NK1) SHALL be valued sequentially with the starting value '1'.
PV1-1 (Set ID - PV1) SHALL be valued with the constant value '1'.
IN1-1 (Set ID – IN1) SHALL be valued with the constant value '1'.
GT1-1 (Set ID - GT1) SHALL be valued with the constant value '1'.
If GT1-3 (Guarantor Name) is ' "" ' then GT1-21 (Guarantor Organizational Name) SHALL be valued.
If GT1-21 (Guarantor Organization Name) is valued ' "" ' then GT1-3 (Guarantor Name) SHALL be valued
The value of DG1-1 (Set ID - DG1) SHALL be valued sequentially starting the value '1' within a given OBSERVATION_REQUEST segment group.
Either DG1-3.3 (Diagnosis Code - DG1.Name of Coding System) or DG1-3.6 (Diagnosis Code - DG1.Name of Alternate Coding System) SHALL be valued 'I9C' or 'I10C'.
The value of TQ1-1 (Set ID - TQ1) SHALL be valued '1'.
If present, OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time) SHALL be equal to or later than OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time).
If OBR-4.3(Name of Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBR-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBR-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
NTE-1 (Set ID - NTE) SHALL be sequentially numbered starting with the value '1' within a given segment group.
PRT-2 (Action Code) SHALL be valued with 'AD' drawn from code system HL70287.
If OBX-3.3 (Name of Coding System) is valued 'LN', OBX-3.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If OBX-3.6 (Name of Alternate coding System) is valued 'LN', OBX-3.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid LOINC code identifier format.
If SPM-4.3 (Name of Coding system) is valued 'SCT', SPM-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
If SPM-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'SCT', SPM-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
When present, either SPM-4.3 (Specimen Type.Name of Coding System) or SPM-4.6 (Specimen Type.Name of Alternate Coding System) SHALL be valued 'SCT', 'HL70487', 'L' or '99zzz' for a local code system.
If SPM-4.3 (Name of Coding system) is valued 'SCT', SPM-4.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
: If SPM-4.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'SCT', SPM-4.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
When present, either SPM-4.3 (Specimen Type.Name of Coding System) or SPM-4.6 (Specimen Type.Name of Alternate Coding System) SHALL be valued 'SCT' or 'HL70487'.
If SPM-5.3 (Name of Coding system) is valued 'SCT', SPM-5.1 (Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
: If SPM-5.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System) is valued 'SCT', SPM-5.4 (Alternate Identifier) SHALL be a valid SNOMED CT code identifier format.
If PV1-20.1 (Financial Class.Financial Class Code) is 'T' (Third Party) or 'P' (Patient) then PID-11 (Patient Address) SHALL include an address with type 'H'.
If PV1-20.1 (Financial Class.Financial Class Code) is valued 'T' (Third Party) or 'P' (Patient), PID-5.7 (Name Type Code) SHALL be valued 'L'.
The value of ORC-2 (Placer Order Number) SHALL be identical to the value of OBR-2 (Placer Order Number) within the same Order Group.
If valued, ORC-3 (Filler Order Number) SHALL be identical to the value of OBR-3 (Filler Order Number) within the same Order Group.
The value of ORC-12 (Ordering Provider) SHALL be identical to the value of OBR-16 (Ordering Provider) within the same Order Group.
The value of OBR-1 (Set ID - OBR) SHALL start at '1' and be incremented sequentially across the Order groups.
The value of OBX-1 (Set ID - OBX) SHALL be valued sequentially starting the value '1' within a given segment group.
For each value in OBR-28 (Result Copies To) a corresponding PRT (Participant Information) SHALL be present with PRT-4.1 (Participation Identifier) valued 'RCT'.
For each PRT (Participant Information) where PRT-4.1 (Participation.Identifier) is valued 'RCT' there must be a corresponding value in OBR-28 (Result Copies To) equal to PRT-5 (Participation Person).

If there are multiple OBX segments associated with the same OBR or SPM segment that have the same OBX-3 (Observation Identifier) values for (OBX-3.1 (Identifier) and OBX-3.3 (Name of Coding System) or (OBX-3.4 (Alternate Identifier) and OBX-3.6 (Name of Alternate Coding System)), a combination of (OBX-3.1 and OBX3.3) or (OBX-3.4 and OBX-3.6) and OBX-4 (Observation Sub-ID) SHALL create a unique identification under a single OBR.
Only one instance of DG1-15 (Diagnosis Priority) in the message SHALL contain the value '1'.

If any of OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time), OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time), SPM-17.1 (Range Start Date/Time) or SPM-17.2 (Range End Date/Time) contain a time zone offset then all SHALL contain a time zone offset.

If any of OBR-7 (Observation Date/Time), OBR-8 (Observation End Date/Time), SPM-17.1 (Range Start Date/Time) or SPM-17.2 (Range End Date/Time) contain a time zone offset then all SHALL contain a time zone offset.
The value of SPM-1 (Set ID - SPM) SHALL start at '1' and be incremented sequentially within the Order Group.
NIST custom plugin to check for GU profile component.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.85' (LOI_GU_PRU_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.66' (LOI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.78' (LOI_GU_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.82' (LAB_PRU_Component) in any order.
The value of ORC-2 (Placer Order Number) SHALL NOT be valued identical to another instance of ORC-2 (Placer Order Number) within the same message excluding the Prior Result group(s).
The value of OBR-2 (Placer Order Number) SHALL NOT be valued identical to another instance of OBR-2 (Placer Order Number) in the message.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.86' (LOI_GU_PRN_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.66' (LOI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.78' (LOI_GU_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.81' (LAB_PRN_Component) in any order.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.85' (LOI_GU_PRU_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.66' (LOI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.78' (LOI_GU_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.82' (LAB_PRU_Component) in any order.

NIST custom plugin to check for NG profile component.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.87' (LOI_NG_PRU_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.66' (LOI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.79' (LOI_NG_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.82' (LAB_PRU_Component) in any order.
The value of ORC-2 (Placer Order Number) SHALL NOT be valued identical to another instance of ORC-2 (Placer Order Number) within the same message excluding the Prior Result group(s).

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.88' (LOI_NG_PRN_Profile) or three occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.66' (LOI_Common_Component), '2.16.840.1.113883.9.79' (LOI_NG_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.81' (LAB_PRN_Component) in any order.

MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.2.3' (LOI_GU_ORL_Response_Profile_Component) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.2.2' (LOI_ORL_Acknowledgement_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.90' (LOI_GU_Acknowledgement_Component) in any order, when acknowledging OML GU Profiles where MSH-21 contains '2.16.840.1.113883.9.85' (LOI_GU_PRU_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.86' (LOI_GU_PRN_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.78' (LOI_GU_Component).

MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.2.4' (LOI_NG_ORL_ Response_Profile) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.195.2.2' (LOI_ORL_Acknowledgement_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.91' (LOI_NG_Acknowledgement_Component) in any order, when acknowledging OML NG Profiles where MSH-21 contains '2.16.840.1.113883.9.87' (LOI_NG_PRU_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.88' (LOI_NG_PRN_Profile), or '2.16.840.1.113883.9.79' (LOI_NG_Component).

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.92' (LOI_GU_Response_Profile) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.89' (LOI_Acknowledgement_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.90' (LOI_GU_Acknowledgement_Component) in any order.

An occurrence of MSH-21 (Message Profile Identifier) SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.93' (LOI_NG_Response_Profile) or two occurrences SHALL be valued with '2.16.840.1.113883.9.89' (LOI_Acknowledgement_Component) and '2.16.840.1.113883.9.91' (LOI_NG_Acknowledgement_Component) in any order.
